item.description:
Okay, so the last time I scheduled a salsa meetup, it was kind of a fail, BUT I have confirmed with Sydonee Harris (salsa instructor) that there will be salsa dancing at Pearl on Thursdays now! This night will actually be the opening night!

---

Class is at 9pm
$10 for class and cover charge
Admission: 21+, Proper Dress

Join Sydonee every Thursday at Pearl Restaurant & Lounge for an all-levels latin dance class. The lesson focuses mainly on Salsa but, on occasion, will touch on other useful dances such as merengue, bachata and/or chacha. The class starts at 9pm with basic movements, works its way into a simple turn, and finishes up with something fancy for the advanced students. The group lesson is followed with a Latin mix by DJ Flipp.

---

More information about Sydonee: http://www.sydonee.co...
More information abotu Pearl: http://www.pearlresta...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be standing near the entrance of the club starting at 8:45pm
item.name: Salsa Dancing at Pearl
